title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 16 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 16 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Matt Walsh of the Daily Wire joins Clay and Buck in the Nashville studio. Liberals mask madness has reached religious zealotry. How can we use facts to calm their fears? Will Afghanistan become a breeding ground for terrorism? If the Biden administration can be this wrong about Afghanistan, what else are they wrong about? Buck talks about his time working for the CIA in Afghanistan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
